channel.title: What're you using for Site Chat? anything better than Tawk.to?
channel.description:
I'm planning to switch our website chat from MyLiveChat to Tawk.to
Advantages I see for Tawk.to
1. Can change the title of the popup (I will be offering chat and guided Tours) 2. cleaner interface. 3. "Que waiting time" displayed (Estimated Wait Time : 1 minute), etc.
The one thing it's missing is hooking into the ScreenSaver on my PC so that when I'm away it changes status to "AWAY".
I plan to use this for cueing people up for the demo.
